name: Wisp (Supertoady)
description:
Controls:

R to Restart 

Arrow keys/WASD to Move

How To Play:

You are a lone wisp who is trapped inside a ghostly dungeon!

You will encounter haunted statues that will move towards you if you get too close. They will destroy you on touch.

When moving into the magical torches, they will both illuminate your path and destroy the haunted statues.

To move to the next room you will need to illuminate all of the torches in the current room.

Secret Coins:

In each room there is one secret coin that you can find.

Try to find all the secret coins!

Made in 1 week for YeegJam 5
